C

changeLocale(Locale) - 类中的方法 view.GameUi
Changes the locale of the game UI and updates the text to match the selected locale.
checkBothReady() - 类中的方法 model.Network
Checks if both host and client are ready, and starts the game if they are.
checkHit(int, int, boolean[][]) - 类中的方法 model.Game
Checks if a hit is made on the specified coordinates of the given board.
checkVictory(int) - 类中的方法 model.Game
Checks if the player has achieved victory by reaching the required number of hits.
Client - model中的类
The Client class represents the client side of a network connection in the Battleship game.
Client() - 类的构造器 model.Client
 
close() - 类中的方法 model.Network
Closes the network connection and releases resources.
computerTurn() - 类中的方法 model.Game
Handles the computer's turn by randomly selecting a move and marking the board.
connect(String, int) - 类中的方法 model.Client
Connects the client socket to the specified server address and port.
controller - 程序包 controller
 
Controller - controller中的类
The Controller class handles the interactions between the GameUi and the game logic.
Controller(GameUi) - 类的构造器 controller.Controller
Constructor for the Controller class.
CustomDialog - view中的类
CustomDialog is a dialog window for setting up network connections in the Battleship game.
CustomDialog(Frame, boolean) - 类的构造器 view.CustomDialog
Constructor for the CustomDialog class.
